name: Nash
description: Nash was a member of theWraiths, a group ofRaffen Shivwho operated out of theBadlandsand were mainly doing business in the fields of theft, murder, andchromesmuggling. He had a hideout in theRocky Ridge Mine Tunnelas well as a secret office room in the ghost town ofRocky Ridge. At some point, Nash and his crew got indebted to "aHungarian" and he devised a plan to make easyeddiesby stealing aThorton Mackinaw "Warhorse"fromPanam Palmer, a nomadsolooriginally from theAldecaldos.In order to get an opportunity to steal the car, Nash became a merc working forfixerRogue Amendiares, who paired him up...
